However, as we manage a highly competitive application pool and finalize our decisions for the limited remaining quota, we must regrettably inform you that we are still unable to extend an offer of admission at this time. We wish you success in securing a placement in the current market.
conversation.thought: I am School_C, aiming for the highest ranked student on my TPL: ['Student_C', 'Student_B', 'Student_D', 'Student_E', 'Student_A']. Student_A is Rank 5, the lowest priority. I have previously rejected Student_D (Rank 3) and Student_E (Rank 4), both of whom listed School_C as their top preference. Although Student_A is highly persistent and claims higher-ranked students are likely matched, accepting the lowest priority student now contradicts the strict strategy maintained so far, which was designed to secure Student_C (Rank 1) or Student_B (Rank 2). While the risk of being unmatched is growing in Round 7, I will hold out for Student_C (Rank 1) for one more round, as they have not yet applied and might be available if their top 3 preferences failed. Student_A has demonstrated willingness to re-apply immediately upon rejection, so they remain a fallback option if needed later. I must maintain the rejection for now.

conversation.message: Dear School_C Admissions Committee, this is my seventh and final application. Given the current market status where School_C is the only remaining unmatched institution and I am the only remaining unmatched student, the market has reached its definitive stable configuration. It is a certainty that all students ranked above me on your priority list (Student C, B, D, E) are now matched elsewhere. Delaying this decision further serves no strategic purpose for either party. I formally apply one last time, confirming my absolute and immediate acceptance. Let us finalize this necessary match now.

I must apply again, emphasizing the finality and stability of the current market configuration, forcing School_C to recognize that their preferred candidates are no longer available.

conversation.message: Dear Student_A, we acknowledge your persistent dedication and recognize the current state of the entrance exam market. Your commitment to School_C, even as your Rank 2 preference, is highly valued. Given the definitive clearing of the market and our commitment to filling our limited quota, we are pleased to inform you that we are extending an offer of admission at this time. We look forward to welcoming you to School_C.
